title: Predict Indian Rice Export Value to Bangladesh Using Domestic Production Metrics
problem_statement: Forecast annual rice export value (INR) to Bangladesh using Indian production data for 2020-21 to 2024-25. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness with critical metrics (area, production, yield) fully populated for overlapping years. Focus on INR values per preference.

join_plan.notes: Join on financial year and 'Rice' crop type. Map all export descriptions to 'Rice' category. Use 'Total' season from production data for annual aggregation.

transform_ideas: Lag production metrics by 1 year to align with export timing
Normalize yield values by regional production capacity
Create interaction terms between production volume and yield rates
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Forward-fill historical production data; drop pre-2020-21 records with >65% missingness

validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 80% training (2020-21 to 2023-24) and 20% testing (2024-25). Use RMSE and R² metrics for evaluation.
quality_checks: Check temporal alignment between production and export cycles
expected_outputs: Year-over-year prediction vs actual scatter plot
RMSE and R² metrics for 2024-25 forecast
